amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 6 in the Congressional Record of February 3, 1998, to change the effective date for renaming the National Airport pending the outcome of a referendum of approval of the by the residents of Arlington County Virginia, where the airport is located.

action.text: Mr. Shuster raised a point of order against the Moran (VA) amendment (A004). Mr. Shuster stated that the content of the amendment was not germane to the bill The Chair sustained the point of order.
